revision.text:
Simple [[ZDoom]] [[frontend|Launcher]] by Piotrek "JemArbuzy" Tylenda, is as the name suggests, a very lightweight and simple launcher for ZDoom on Windows written in C++, or possibly Delphi. The project is no longer maintained, due to lack of interest. The sourcecode has also since been lost, and the Launcher itself does not contain a complete featureset.
==External Links== *[http://members.tripod.co.uk/Enjay001/szl.zip http://members.tripod.co.uk/Enjay001/szl.zip] *[http://reddevils.ath.cx/public/misc/szl.zip http://reddevils.ath.cx/public/misc/szl.zip] [[Category:Dead software]]
